text: Kimberly Bruckner Baldwin (born June 19, 1970, in Chicago, Illinois) is an American road cyclist. She represented her nation at the 2001, 2002, 2004 and 2006 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American female cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Cyclists from Illinois Category:Cyclists at the 2003 Pan American Games
title: Kimberly Baldwin
